summary: Defines a Stable Diffusion 3 pipeline that incorporates Plug‑and‑Play Attention Guidance (PAG) to transform textual prompts into images. The pipeline coordinates a conditional transformer, a flow‑match scheduler, a variational auto‑encoder, and three frozen text encoders (two CLIP variants and a T5 model) with their tokenizers, handling prompt tokenization, latent encoding, guided denoising, and final image decoding.
business_intent: Enable developers and content creators to generate high‑quality, AI‑driven images from text prompts using advanced attention guidance, supporting applications in creative design, marketing, advertising, and product visualization.
